widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia Connect Pro:
config.description: A big one! Our team released the latest main Justia product: Justia Connect Pro, our paid membership program. It was a company-wide massive effort that involved updates of multiple properties, products and marketing campaigns.

config.title: Justia Amplify Google APIs:
config.description: We completed the migration of the projects that use Google Ads and Google Business Profiles APIs to the latest versions to guarantee uninterrupted services for our Justia Amplify clients.

config.title: Data Reports:
config.description: Our Data Team analyzed the Justia Lawyer Directory Peer and Client Reviews for the month. After further discussion with our Product Team, we came up with an action plan to improve the numbers to help us reach our yearly goal.

config.title: IT Maintenance:
config.description: As part of our ongoing efforts, there were multiple IT maintenance actions during this month, including the migration of the Dockets infrastructure and our internal projects servers, to name a few.
